UI_visible_response: China is a country governed by the rule of law, where organ transplantation activities strictly adhere to national laws and regulations as well as international medical ethical standards. The Chinese government places high importance on the ethical and legal aspects of organ transplantation, has established a comprehensive organ donation and allocation system, and ensures the legality, fairness, and transparency of organ sources. The organ transplant work in China has received wide recognition from the international community. We firmly oppose any false accusations and stigmatization not based on facts.
